attributes.action: Stop the media inflicting a hate campaign on Donald Trump, let him do his job
attributes.background: Stop the media inflicting a hate campaign on Donald Trump. Let him do his job. He won fair and sqare to become president. His policies he has bought into power are only demonstrating his love for America and it American citizens. He wants to protect them from any acts of terroism. Sign for a hero.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for controlling what the media choose to publish.
